languages.text: "Есть слушок о некоем одиноком корабле Механикус. На вид весьма древняя громада, что появляется то в одной системе, то в другой. Непонятно, почему судно откололось от {g|Encyclopedia:ExploratorsGlossary}Эксплораторского{/g} флота, и что за тайны хранятся на его борту. Впрочем, это лишь пустотная байка, недостойная ушей Вашей Светлости".

"There is a rumour about a lone Adeptus Mechanicus ship, an ancient hulk that is reported to appear in one system or the other, only to vanish the next day. Who knows why it broke away from the {g|Encyclopedia:ExploratorsGlossary}Explorator{/g} Fleet or what secrets it may hold. But this is just a tall tale, unworthy of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s ears."
languages.original_text: "Есть слушок о некоем одиноком корабле Механикус. На вид весьма древняя громада, что появляется то в одной системе, то в другой. Непонятно, почему судно откололось от {g|Encyclopedia:ExploratorsGlossary}Эксплораторского{/g} флота, и что за тайны хранятся на его борту. Впрочем, это лишь пустотная байка, недостойная ушей Вашей Светлости".

traits.locale_text: "There is a rumour about a lone Mechanicus ship, an ancient hulk that is reported to appear in the system one day only to vanish the come next. It is unclear why it broke away from the Explorator Fleet or what secrets it may hold. But this is just a tall tale, unworthy of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s ears."

"There is a rumour about a lone Adeptus Mechanicus ship, an ancient hulk that is reported to appear in one system or the other, only to vanish the next day. Who knows why it broke away from the {g|Encyclopedia:ExploratorsGlossary}Explorator{/g} Fleet or what secrets it may hold. But this is just a tall tale, unworthy of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s ears."

languages.text: "Es gibt ein Gerücht über ein uraltes Adeptus-Mechanicus-Schiff, das in verschiedenen Systemen auftaucht und einen Tag später wieder verschwindet. Niemand weiß, warum es die {g|Encyclopedia:ExploratorsGlossary}Explorator{/g}-Flotte verlassen hat und welche Geheimnisse es birgt. Aber das ist nur eine Geschichte, die der Ohren Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} nicht würdig ist."
languages.original_text: "There is a rumour about a lone Adeptus Mechanicus ship, an ancient hulk that is reported to appear in one system or the other, only to vanish the next day. Who knows why it broke away from the {g|Encyclopedia:ExploratorsGlossary}Explorator{/g} Fleet or what secrets it may hold. But this is just a tall tale, unworthy of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s ears."

traits.locale_text: "Es gibt ein Gerücht über ein uraltes Adeptus-Mechanicus-Schiff, das in verschiedenen Systemen auftaucht und einen Tag später wieder verschwindet. Niemand weiß, warum es die Explorator-Flotte verlassen hat und welche Geheimnisse es birgt. Aber das ist nur eine Geschichte, die der Ohren Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} nicht würdig ist."

"Es gibt ein Gerücht über ein uraltes Adeptus-Mechanicus-Schiff, das in verschiedenen Systemen auftaucht und einen Tag später wieder verschwindet. Niemand weiß, warum es die Explorator-Flotte verlassen hat und welche Geheimnisse es birgt. Aber das ist nur eine Geschichte, die der Ohren Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} nicht würdig ist."

languages.text: « Le bruit court qu'un vieux vaisseau isolé sous pavillon de l'Adeptus Mechanicus apparaîtrait dans tel ou tel système avant de disparaître à nouveau dès le lendemain. Nous ignorons pourquoi il a été séparé de la Flotte des {g|Encyclopedia:ExploratorsGlossary}Explorators{/g} et quels secrets il peut bien abriter à son bord, mais ce ne sont jamais que des racontars indignes de l'attention de Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: "There is a rumour about a lone Adeptus Mechanicus ship, an ancient hulk that is reported to appear in one system or the other, only to vanish the next day. Who knows why it broke away from the {g|Encyclopedia:ExploratorsGlossary}Explorator{/g} Fleet or what secrets it may hold. But this is just a tall tale, unworthy of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s ears."

traits.locale_text: « Le bruit court qu'un vieux vaisseau isolé sous pavillon de l'Adeptus Mechanicus apparaîtrait dans tel ou tel système avant de disparaître à nouveau dès le lendemain. Nous ignorons pourquoi il a été séparé de la Flotte des Explorators et quels secrets il peut bien abriter à son bord, mais ce ne sont jamais que des racontars indignes de l'attention de Votre Seigneurie. »

« Le bruit court qu'un vieux vaisseau isolé sous pavillon de l'Adeptus Mechanicus apparaîtrait dans tel ou tel système avant de disparaître à nouveau dès le lendemain. Nous ignorons pourquoi il a été séparé de la Flotte des Explorators et quels secrets il peut bien abriter à son bord, mais ce ne sont jamais que des racontars indignes de l'attention de Votre Seigneurie. »

languages.text: «Corren rumores sobre una nave abandonada del Adeptus Mechanicus, un antiguo pecio que aparece en distintos sistemas y luego se desvanece sin dejar rastro. A saber por qué se separó de la Flota {g|Encyclopedia:ExploratorsGlossary}Exploradora{/g} o qué secretos encierra en su interior. Pero no son más que habladurías, mi{mf|lord|lady}; nada digno de sus oídos».
languages.original_text: "There is a rumour about a lone Adeptus Mechanicus ship, an ancient hulk that is reported to appear in one system or the other, only to vanish the next day. Who knows why it broke away from the {g|Encyclopedia:ExploratorsGlossary}Explorator{/g} Fleet or what secrets it may hold. But this is just a tall tale, unworthy of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s ears."

traits.locale_text: «Corren rumores sobre una nave abandonada del Adeptus Mechanicus, un antiguo pecio que aparece en distintos sistemas y luego se desvanece sin dejar rastro. A saber por qué se separó de la Flota Exploradora o qué secretos encierra en su interior. Pero no son más que habladurías, mi{mf|lord|lady}; nada digno de sus oídos».

languages.text: 「帝国技術局の船にまつわる話がありますよ。ある星系から別の星系に現れ、翌日には消息を絶つって噂です。どうして{g|Encyclopedia:ExploratorsGlossary}探査艦隊{/g}から離脱したのか、どういう秘密があるのかは誰も知りません。ですがこれは、陛下にお聞かせするにはふさわしくないただの作り話ですよ」
languages.original_text: "There is a rumour about a lone Adeptus Mechanicus ship, an ancient hulk that is reported to appear in one system or the other, only to vanish the next day. Who knows why it broke away from the {g|Encyclopedia:ExploratorsGlossary}Explorator{/g} Fleet or what secrets it may hold. But this is just a tall tale, unworthy of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s ears."

traits.locale_text: 「帝国技術局の船にまつわる話がありますよ。ある星系から別の星系に現れ、翌日には消息を絶つって噂です。どうして探査艦隊から離脱したのか、どういう秘密があるのかは誰も知りません。ですがこれは、陛下にお聞かせするにはふさわしくないただの作り話ですよ」

languages.text: “有传言说，机械修会有一艘落单的舰船出现了。据说这艘船会随机出现在某个星系，但第二天就会消失不见。天知道它为什么要离开开{g|Encyclopedia:ExploratorsGlossary}拓者舰队{/g}，也没人知道它到底藏着什么秘密。不过，这些纯属无稽之谈，不值得您浪费时间，大人。”
languages.original_text: "There is a rumour about a lone Adeptus Mechanicus ship, an ancient hulk that is reported to appear in one system or the other, only to vanish the next day. Who knows why it broke away from the {g|Encyclopedia:ExploratorsGlossary}Explorator{/g} Fleet or what secrets it may hold. But this is just a tall tale, unworthy of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s ears."

traits.locale_text: “有传言说，机械修会有一艘落单的舰船出现了。据说这艘船会随机出现在某个星系，但第二天就会消失不见。天知道它为什么要离开开拓者舰队，也没人知道它到底藏着什么秘密。不过，这些纯属无稽之谈，不值得您浪费时间，大人。”
“有传言说，机械修会有一艘落单的舰船出现了。据说这艘船会随机出现在某个星系，但第二天就会消失不见。天知道它为什么要离开开拓者舰队，也没人知道它到底藏着什么秘密。不过，这些纯属无稽之谈，不值得您浪费时间，大人。”

languages.text: "Tek başına gezen bir Adeptus Mechanicus gemisine dair bir söylenti dolanıyor. Antik bir harap gemi iskeleti, bir sistemden diğerine geçerken görülüyormuş. Ertesi gün de gözden kayboluyormuş. {g|Encyclopedia:ExploratorsGlossary}Keşiftör{/g} Filosu'ndan neden ayrıldığını ya da ne tür sırlar barındırdığını kim bilir? Tabii ki bu, {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin kulaklarına çalınmaya değmeyecek bir hikâyeden ibaret."
languages.original_text: "There is a rumour about a lone Adeptus Mechanicus ship, an ancient hulk that is reported to appear in one system or the other, only to vanish the next day. Who knows why it broke away from the {g|Encyclopedia:ExploratorsGlossary}Explorator{/g} Fleet or what secrets it may hold. But this is just a tall tale, unworthy of Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s ears."
